item.description:
theMOVE is proudly putting on our third annual farm-volunteer camping weekend, at Many Hands Organic Farm in Barre MA — an amazing invitation to visit the home and farm of NOFA/Mass Executive Director, Julie Rawson! 18-person limit. getoutma.org/volunteer


Our weekend trips are designed for folks looking to get a rich, in-depth, farm-volunteer experience. The trip will run from Friday evening to Sunday afternoon. While the bulk of our participants will be adults, we welcome participants as young as 10, so long as every minor is accompanied by an adult (at least 1 adult per 2 youth).  $80 for nonmembers, $70 for members. Includes transportation, accommodations, and farm-fresh meals.  We'll camp at Camp Coldbrook, which has easy access to restrooms, hot showers, and drinking water. We’ll sleep in in double/quad tents. Participants will need to bring their own sleeping bags. We ask that you arrange for your own tents as well, but we can arrange one for you if needed.

More info and registration at getoutma.org/volunteer.
item.name: Farming/Camping Weekend at Many Hands Organic Farm
